name: Fungal Fiction
description:
'Fungal Fiction' is interactive fiction that deals with how stories can potentially develop into many versions and layers.  The game relates fungi growth to the creative process, the link between life and death, evolution and extinction. 

Players navigate with fungi watching short films and reading the story, which allows the viewer to imagine what is secretly placed in silent space between stories.  

Credits

game design, text, sound, images by Yuri Lee

3D modeling by  Seung-cheol Kim, Polygonix

Unity programming by Ji-young Yoon
